# SoftWhere.uz

> SoftWhere.uz is a web and mobile app development company based in Uzbekistan, specializing in custom software solutions, web applications, mobile apps, and business consulting.

## About Us

- [Homepage](https://softwhere.uz/) - Overview of our services and company information
- [Blog](https://softwhere.uz/blog) - Articles and insights about development, business, and technology

## Services

- [Website Development](https://softwhere.uz#services) - Custom website development services
- [Mobile App Development](https://softwhere.uz#services) - iOS and Android app development
- [Business Consulting](https://softwhere.uz#services) - Strategic consulting for businesses
- [Project Estimation Tool](https://softwhere.uz/estimator) - Get cost and timeline estimates for your project

## Projects

- [Portfolio](https://softwhere.uz#projects) - Overview of our previous projects and case studies
- [Client Testimonials](https://softwhere.uz#contact) - What our clients say about us

## Optional

- [FAQ](https://softwhere.uz#faq) - Common questions about our services and process
- [Contact Information](https://softwhere.uz#contact) - Get in touch with our team
